meanings.definition: Expandors (noun): devices used to increase the size or scope of something
meanings.sent1: The expandors helped the map look bigger.
meanings.sent2: The expandors in the telescope made distant objects clearer.
meanings.sent3: The expandors in the game made the character grow to giant size!
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like expandors, stretching the boundaries of what was possible.
meanings.sent5: The expandors were like magic wands, making everything they touched larger.

meanings.definition: Expandors (verb): to make something larger or more extensive
meanings.sent1: She used the expandors to enlarge the photo.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to expandors their product line.
meanings.sent3: He expandors the story so much that it became unbelievable!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to expandors the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The music expandors the emotions, making everyone feel deeply.
